articles.description: The Air Grand Touring Performance will cost $179,000 and go 446 miles on a charge.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ And then there were two: the Lucid Air Grand Touring and the Lucid Air Grand Touring Performance.
120 with 70 posters participating, including story author
